title: Pakistani Man Charged With Cyber Crime For False Posts Linked To UK Riots
content: A Pakistani man appeared in court Wednesday to face charges of cyber terrorism after allegedly spreading disinformation on his clickbait website thought to have fuelled anti-immigration riots in Britain.
summary: A Pakistani man appeared in court Wednesday to face charges of cyber terrorism after allegedly spreading disinformation on his clickbait website thought to have fuelled anti-immigration riots in Britain.

title: 2 Bodies Found Inside Mike Lynch's Sunken Yacht: Report
content: Scuba divers scouring the wreck of British tech magnate Mike Lynch's family yacht, which sank off Sicily two days ago, have found two bodies inside it, a source close to rescue operations said on Wednesday.
summary: Scuba divers scouring the wreck of British tech magnate Mike Lynch's family yacht, which sank off Sicily two days ago, have found two bodies inside it, a source close to rescue operations said on Wednesday.

title: PM To Bond With Indian Poles Over Legacy Of Maharajas Of Jamnagar, Kolhapur
content: As Poland rolled out the red carpet for Prime Minister Narendra Modi today, hundreds of 'Indian Poles' are commemorating a historic facet of India-Poland relations which has been the bedrock of people-to-people ties between the two countries.
summary: As Poland rolled out the red carpet for Prime Minister Narendra Modi today, hundreds of 'Indian Poles' are commemorating a historic facet of India-Poland relations which has been the bedrock of people-to-people ties between the two countries.

title: WhatsApp Introduces New Feature, A 4-Digit Username PIN To Combat Spam
content: In its latest beta release, WhatsApp is introducing a significant privacy feature designed to address one of the platform's most persistent issues--spam.
summary: In its latest beta release, WhatsApp is introducing a significant privacy feature designed to address one of the platform's most persistent issues--spam.

title: Iran Executes Fortune Teller For Raping Clients Under "False Pretences"
content: Authorities in central Iran executed a male fortune-teller for raping and sexually assaulting his clients, the judiciary said on Wednesday.
summary: Authorities in central Iran executed a male fortune-teller for raping and sexually assaulting his clients, the judiciary said on Wednesday.

title: Opinion: Modi's Ukraine Trip Is Why The World Shouldn't Compare India And China
content: New Delhi has continued to maintain its ties with both Moscow and Kyiv throughout the course of the war, remaining steadfast in its belief that both sides should be engaged if a lasting solution is to be found.
summary: New Delhi has continued to maintain its ties with both Moscow and Kyiv throughout the course of the war, remaining steadfast in its belief that both sides should be engaged if a lasting solution is to be found.

title: Russia Stops Ukrainian Drones Fired At Moscow During Massive Attack
content: Ukraine fired 11 drones Wednesday at Moscow that Russia said were shot down during one of the largest strikes against the capital, while Ukrainian defences reported stopping 50 Russian drones and missiles.
summary: Ukraine fired 11 drones Wednesday at Moscow that Russia said were shot down during one of the largest strikes against the capital, while Ukrainian defences reported stopping 50 Russian drones and missiles.

title: 116-Year-Old Japanese Mountaineer To Be Named World's Oldest Person
content: A 116-year-old Japanese woman who used to be a mountaineer is set to be named the world's oldest person by Guinness World Records, a research group said on Wednesday, following the death of a 117-year-old Spanish woman earlier this week.
summary: A 116-year-old Japanese woman who used to be a mountaineer is set to be named the world's oldest person by Guinness World Records, a research group said on Wednesday, following the death of a 117-year-old Spanish woman earlier this week.

title: Hope For Early Return Of Peace, Stability: PM Modi Ahead Of Ukraine Visit
content: Ahead of his visit to Ukrainian capital Kyiv, Prime Minister Narendra Modi today said he was looking forward to sharing perspectives with President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on a peaceful resolution of the Ukraine conflict.
summary: Ahead of his visit to Ukrainian capital Kyiv, Prime Minister Narendra Modi today said he was looking forward to sharing perspectives with President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on a peaceful resolution of the Ukraine conflict.

title: 2-Year-Old Child In US Accidentally Shoots Mother's Boyfriend
content: The child gained access to a gun and unintentionally shot the man, leaving him in critical condition.
summary: The child gained access to a gun and unintentionally shot the man, leaving him in critical condition.

title: Indian Doctor Arrested In US For Taking Videos Of Naked Children, Adults
content: A 40-year-old Indian doctor was held in a US jail on a USD 2 million bond after being charged with multiple sex crimes for allegedly recording hundreds of nude images and videos of children and women over several years, according to media reports.
summary: A 40-year-old Indian doctor was held in a US jail on a USD 2 million bond after being charged with multiple sex crimes for allegedly recording hundreds of nude images and videos of children and women over several years, according to media reports.

title: Misogynist Influencer Andrew Tate's Romania House Raided Over Rape Charges
content: Romanian authorities on Wednesday searched the home of controversial influencer Andrew Tate, who is awaiting trial over human trafficking and rape charges, as part of a new investigation, officials said.
summary: Romanian authorities on Wednesday searched the home of controversial influencer Andrew Tate, who is awaiting trial over human trafficking and rape charges, as part of a new investigation, officials said.

title: Pro-Palestine Democrats Welcome Biden's Exit But Side-Eye Kamala Harris
content: Though there are only a handful of them among thousands of delegates, the "Uncommitted Movement" delegates at the Democratic National Convention are among the most vocal. They plan to voice their discontent with the war in Gaza at the convention.
summary: Though there are only a handful of them among thousands of delegates, the "Uncommitted Movement" delegates at the Democratic National Convention are among the most vocal. They plan to voice their discontent with the war in Gaza at the convention.

title: 'AI Scientist' Writes Science Papers Without Human Input. That's Concerning
content: Scientific discovery is one of the most sophisticated human activities. Can and should a complex process be automated?
summary: Scientific discovery is one of the most sophisticated human activities. Can and should a complex process be automated?

title: A Look At Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed Bin Salman's Rise To Power
content: In the heart of the Middle East, where power and tradition are deeply intertwined, one man has risen to hold the reins of a nation known for its strict adherence to conservative values and immense wealth derived from oil.
summary: In the heart of the Middle East, where power and tradition are deeply intertwined, one man has risen to hold the reins of a nation known for its strict adherence to conservative values and immense wealth derived from oil.

title: Crocodile Kills Bathing Woman In Indonesia, Its Belly Cut Open For Body Parts
content: A crocodile killed a woman bathing in a river in eastern Indonesia, police and locals said Wednesday, with villagers later recovering parts of her body from the slaughtered animal.
summary: A crocodile killed a woman bathing in a river in eastern Indonesia, police and locals said Wednesday, with villagers later recovering parts of her body from the slaughtered animal.

title: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh In US From August 23-26. Here's The Agenda
content: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh will be on a four-day visit to the US beginning Friday to further boost the comprehensive global strategic partnership between the two countries.
summary: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh will be on a four-day visit to the US beginning Friday to further boost the comprehensive global strategic partnership between the two countries.

title: Who Was Daniele Chirinos, Olympian Found Dead After Choking On Food In US
content: Daniela Larreal Chirinos, one of Venezuela's best-known athletes and five-time Olympian, has been found dead at her Las Vegas apartment. The retired cyclist reportedly choked on her food, police said.
summary: Daniela Larreal Chirinos, one of Venezuela's best-known athletes and five-time Olympian, has been found dead at her Las Vegas apartment. The retired cyclist reportedly choked on her food, police said.

title: Russia Shoots Down 11 Drones In One Of Ukraine's "Biggest Attack Ever"
content: Ukraine attacked Moscow on Wednesday with at least 11 drones shot down by air defences in what Russian officials said was one of the biggest drone strikes on the capital since the war in Ukraine began in February 2022.
summary: Ukraine attacked Moscow on Wednesday with at least 11 drones shot down by air defences in what Russian officials said was one of the biggest drone strikes on the capital since the war in Ukraine began in February 2022.

title: Vladimir Putin Inspects Chechen Troops Gearing Up To Fight Ukraine
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin and Chechen leader Ramzan Kadyrov on Tuesday inspected Chechen troops and volunteers readying to fight Ukraine, the Kremlin said, in what was Putin's first trip in 13 years to the North Caucasus republic.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin and Chechen leader Ramzan Kadyrov on Tuesday inspected Chechen troops and volunteers readying to fight Ukraine, the Kremlin said, in what was Putin's first trip in 13 years to the North Caucasus republic.
